other_tests.findings: Ms G experienced 2 manic episodes resulting in inpatient psychiatry hospitalizations.
other_tests.changes_over_time: During her second hospitalization, she was treated with divalproex, 750 mg twice daily, and olanzapine, 5 mg at bedtime.

other_tests.findings: After her second hospitalization, Ms G developed a major depressive episode and started taking bupropion for treatment.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Ms G did well but was frightened due to the risk of further episodes.

other_tests.findings: Dr Kennedy suggested a nasal endoscopy to evaluate for chronic inflammation, polyps, or edema.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Mr S had not experienced sinusitis for 9 months after the conference but subsequently had a single episode treated successfully.

other_tests.findings: Mr S thinks his overall improvement may be due to the allergy shots he has taken over the past year.
